document.docAuthor: Olmi, Massimo, Copeland, Robert S., Guglielmino, Adalgisa & Icipe
document.masterDocTitle: An updated checklist of Dryinidae, Embolemidae and Sclerogibbidae (Hymenoptera) of Kenya and Burundi, with descriptions of thirteen new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An updated checklist of Dryinidae, Embolemidae and Sclerogibbidae (Hymenoptera) of Kenya and Burundi, with descriptions of thirteen new species

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Tropical Entomology Research Center, Viterbo, Via De Gasperi 10, 01100 Italy; e-mail: olmi @ unitus. it & Corresponding author

Department of Agriculture, Forests, Nature and Energy, University of Tuscia, Via San Camillo de Lellis, Viterbo, 01100 Italy; e-mail: guglielm @ unitus. it

Distribution. Afrotropical, recorded from almost all sub-saharian countries, from Senegal to Somalia and Sudan , in addition to Madagascar and Yemen ( OLMI & HARTEN 2000 , OLMI & COPELAND 2011 ).
